alert.note: Alert for Polk (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 4:53PM CST until March 01 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Polk County in western Arkansas... * Until 545 PM CST. * At 453 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vandervoort, or 17 miles southwest of Mena, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mena... Wickes... Hatfield... Vandervoort... Shady... Hartley... Opal... Cossatot River State Park... Bard Springs Recreation Area... Caney Creek Wilderness... Mena Intermountain Airport... Mccauley... Cove... Big Fork... Board Camp... Nunley... Ink... Shady Lake Recreation Area... Hatton... Cherry Hill in Polk County... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for western Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for western Arkansas.
